task_description:
Update the GHL controller and Prisma service for Evolution API instance management.

## Update: src/ghl/ghl.controller.ts

### Update CreateInstanceDto interface:
Change from:
- locationId: string
- instanceId: string  
- apiToken: string
- name?: string

To:
- locationId: string
- instanceName: string
- evolutionApiUrl: string
- evolutionApiKey: string
- name?: string

### Update getInstances() method:
- Return instanceName instead of idInstance
- Return evolutionApiUrl in response
- Map state correctly (open/close/connecting)

### Update createInstance() method:
- Call ghlService.createEvolutionInstanceForUser() with new parameters
- Update response to return instanceName

### Update deleteInstance() and updateInstance():
- Look up instance by instanceName (string) instead of BigInt id
- Update parameter parsing

## Update: src/prisma/prisma.service.ts

### Update methods to use instanceName (string) instead of idInstance (BigInt):

- getInstance(instanceName: string) - find by instanceName
- removeInstance(instanceName: string) - delete by instanceName  
- updateInstanceSettings(instanceName: string, settings)
- updateInstanceState(instanceName: string, state)
- updateInstanceName(instanceName: string, name)
- createInstance() - use new schema fields

### Remove:
- Any BigInt conversions
- StorageProvider interface from @green-api/greenapi-integration (create local interface if needed)

Keep the User model methods unchanged.
